metadata.title: CVE-2024-0741 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An out of bounds write in ANGLE could have allowed an attacker to corruptmemory leading to a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 122, Firefox ESR < 115.7, and Thunderbird < 115.7.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
